last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 18 - Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: Zi-Feng proposes to Ya-Nuo the night before her 26th birthday. Ya-Nuo is thrown into confusion because she still can't reveal her true self.

name: Bromance
overview: Could anyone be more excited to reach her 25th birthday? Pi Ya Nuo had an inauspicious start to her life. Doomed to live her life as a boy, Ya Nuo is shy and always tries to keep her distance to people to hide her true identity, and the mysterious aloofness makes her irresistible to the girls around her. With her 26th birthday fast approaching, will Ya Nuo find her much-anticipated return to being a female will be as easy as she had hoped?

episodes.name: Episode 1 - Sworn Brothers
episodes.overview: A fortuneteller told Pi Ya-Nuo's parents to raise her as a male until her 26th birthday. With just 100 days left, she becomes entangled with some local gangsters, and there's a romantic spark between her and her new "Sworn Brother."

episodes.name: Episode 2 - Cruise Ship and Loose Lips
episodes.overview: Ya-Yuo and Xiao-Jung go on a cruise only to run into the Du Family onboard. When Xiao-Jung gets drunk, she starts spilling secrets.

episodes.name: Episode 3 - A New Job with Hidden Perils
episodes.overview: After her hot dog truck gets stolen, Zi-Feng offers Ya-Nuo a job as his personal assistant, but she gets more than she bargained for when she confronts a dishonest journalist. Qing-Yang warms up to Yang Na-Na.

episodes.name: Episode 4 - Hot Springs Encounter
episodes.overview: After Zi-Feng's rescue, Ya-Nuo is hospitalized. They go to a hot spings spa to get rid of bad luck and Ya-Nuo almost gets exposed, in more ways than one.

episodes.name: Episode 5 - A Camping We Will Go
episodes.overview: The band of friends go camping and Zi-Feng suffers from hypothermia. A rival family tries to separate Zi-Feng from Ya-Nuo.

episodes.name: Episode 6 - Blind Date
episodes.overview: Zi-Feng learns the true identify of his childhood savior. While testing out her female identify Ya-Nuo sees Zi-Feng on a blind date that his mother set up for him.

episodes.name: Episode 7 - Problems with Revealing Enemies and Lovers
episodes.overview: Zi-Feng and Ya-Nuo meet with a rival gangster who's been monitoring them. Na-Na's relationship with Uncle Tian is revealed. Zi-Feng prepares a confession until he overhears Ya-Nuo's conversation.

episodes.name: Episode 8 - Mending Fences
episodes.overview: A Tabloid makes implications about Zi-Feng and Y-Nuo's relationship, but it only brings them closer. Zi Feng comes up with a proposition to bring Na-Na and Uncle Tian together.

episodes.name: Episode 9 - Female Excapades and Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: Ya-Nuo meets Zi-Feng while acting as her own twin sister. Ya-Nuo finds out that someone knows her secret. A family reunion doesn't go as expected.

episodes.name: Episode 10 - Pillow Fights and Close Encounters
episodes.overview: Zi-Feng and Ya-Nuo's pillow fight comes to a conclusion when they are busted in the act.  They try everything they can to help Mr. Du regain his memory to no avail. Their own relationship ends up closer than ever before.

episodes.name: Episode 11 - Mending Relationships
episodes.overview: Ya-Nuo is devastated by a betrayal but tries to mend the relationship. Na-Na and Qing get close as she reveals why she wanted the NT $20 million.

episodes.name: Episode 12 - Lost and Found
episodes.overview: Na-Na and Uncle Tian bond as father and daughter, only to get some devastating news. Zi-Feng reveals to his family that his father has returned.  Han Sheng plans a deadly solution to his problems.

episodes.name: Episode 13 - Together At Last
episodes.overview: Ya-Nuo and Zi-Feng become a couple. Ya-Nuo discovers why she was betrayed. The stolen hot dog van is discovered abandoned on the side of a road.

episodes.name: Episode 14 - Building a Family
episodes.overview: Zi-Feng's family is confronted by Ya-Nuo and Zi-Feng's relationship. Secret plans for made for his parents 30th Anniversary.

episodes.name: Episode 15 - I've Got a Secret
episodes.overview: Na-Na prepares for her operation while keeping it a secret from Qing Yang. The mystery cuff link leads to the culprit.

episodes.name: Episode 16 - Bonds of Brotherhood
episodes.overview: Despite his injury, Zhe Rui and Zi-Feng become friends. Qing Yang commits to nursing Na-Na to recovery.

episodes.name: Episode 17 - Culprits Revealed
episodes.overview: Zi-Feng comes closer to finding the owner of the cuff link but another party confesses. Zhe Rui gets his bandages removed, and Na-Na wonders about Qing Yang's true feelings.

episodes.name: Episode 18 - Finale
episodes.overview: Zi-Feng proposes to Ya-Nuo the night before her 26th birthday. Ya-Nuo is thrown into confusion because she still can't reveal her true self.
